attributes.action: Invoke article 61 Magna Carta 1215 against MPs and Lords denying Brexit
attributes.additional_details: The disgraceful amendments by the Lords and shameful comments made about Brexiteers
attributes.background: MPs agreeing 6.1 to abide by the referendum result and then backsliding

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
